/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {

    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',

      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {

    },

    },
    surgery: {

    },

  return info[category];
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',

    },

    },
    miscellaneous: {

      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',

      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',

      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {

    },

    },

  return info[category];
}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyond—save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {

      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {

      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

Now let me compile the final validation report: --- # PRODUCT GUIDES SYSTEM - FINAL RELEASE VALIDATION REPORT ## Overall Verdict: **PASS WITH ISSUES** The product guides system is largely ready for production but has some minor issues that should be addressed. --- ## 1. PRODUCT REGISTRY COMPLETENESS **Status: PASS WITH ISSUES** ### Product Count - **Actual Products:** 76 products in registry - **Products with regionLinks:** 75 products (1 product has empty regionLinks - tretinoin_guide uses directLink instead) ### Region Coverage - All products using `buildRegionLinks()` have 5 Amazon regions (us, uk, de, fr, au) plus asia fallback - This is correct - the comment claims "73 products" but actual count is 76 ### Required Fields All products have: - [x] id - [x] name - [x] brand (optional, some are 'Generic') - [x] category - [x] tagline - [x] description - [x] priority - [x] priceRange - [x] regionLinks (empty for tretinoin_guide which uses directLink) - [x] imageUrl ### Duplicate Images Issue **12 images are reused across multiple products:** | Image | Count | Products | |-------|-------|----------| | photo-1617897903246-719242758050 | 4 | Multiple skincare items | | photo-1598440947619-2c35fc9aa908 | 3 | Multiple skincare items | | photo-1587854692152-cbe660dbde88 | 3 | arnica_gel, scar_gel, tretinoin | | photo-1556228578-0d85b1a4d571 | 3 | cerave_cleanser, nizoral_shampoo, timeless_vitamin_c | | + 8 more with 2 uses each | - | - | **Priority: Medium** - Not blocking but reduces visual distinction between products. --- ## 2. GUIDE CONTENT COMPLETENESS **Status: PASS WITH ISSUES** ### Guide Count - **Total Guides:** 62 guide files - **Guides with heroMedia:** 62 (100%) - **All guides have at least 2 sections:** Verified in samples ### Related Guides Issue **One invalid relatedGuide reference found:** | File | Invalid Reference | |------|-------------------| | `/src/data/guides/debloating-protocol.ts` | `'sodium-bloating'` | This guide ID does not exist in the registry. References `['sodium-bloating', 'cortisol-management', 'body-fat']` but `sodium-bloating` is not a valid guide. **Priority: High** - Will cause runtime errors when trying to get related guides. ### Product ID Aliases All shorthand product IDs in guides are properly aliased: - `ashwagandha` -> `ashwagandha_ksm66` - `creatine` -> `creatine_mono` - `omega_3` -> `omega3_fish_oil` - `zinc` -> `zinc_picolinate` --- ## 3. TYPE SAFETY **Status: PASS** - TypeScript check: **No errors** (`npx tsc --noEmit` passed) - ESLint: **Warnings only** (img vs Image, hook dependencies - not blocking) ### GuideProduct Interface Matches actual product structure: - [x] id: string - [x] name: string - [x] brand?: string - [x] category: ProductCategory - [x] tagline: string - [x] description: string - [x] priority: number - [x] priceRange?: { min, max, currency } - [x] regionLinks: ProductRegionLinks - [x] directLink?: string - [x] imageUrl?: string - [x] isBaseStack?: boolean ### Guide Interface Matches actual guide structure: - [x] id, slug, title, subtitle, description - [x] icon, humorLevel, estimatedReadTime, order - [x] sections: GuideSection[] - [x] relatedGuides?: string[] - [x] productIds?: string[] - [x] tags?: string[] - [x] heroMedia?: GuideMedia - [x] forumCategory?: string - [x] genderTarget?: GenderTarget --- ## 4. HELPER FUNCTIONS **Status: PASS** ### Product Registry Helpers Located in `/src/data/guides/products-registry.ts`: - [x] `getGuideProductById(id)` - Works with aliases - [x] `getGuideProductsByCategory(category)` - Returns sorted by priority - [x] `getBaseStackProducts()` - Returns 15 base stack products - [x] `searchGuideProducts(query)` - Searches name, description, tagline, brand ### Guide Helpers Located in `/src/data/guides/index.ts`: - [x] `getGuideById(id)` - Returns from GUIDES_BY_ID - [x] `getGuideBySlug(slug)` - Returns from GUIDES_BY_SLUG - [x] `getGuidesByCategory(categoryId)` - Returns guides in category - [x] `searchGuides(query)` - Searches title, description, subtitle, tags - [x] `getRelatedGuides(guideId)` - Returns related guides (issue: will fail silently for sodium-bloating) - [x] `getGuidesByGender(gender)` - Filters male/female guides --- ## 5. REGION SYSTEM **Status: PASS** ### buildAmazonUrl Function Located in `/src/lib/region.ts`: ```typescript export function buildAmazonUrl(asin: string, region: Region): string { const config = REGION_CONFIGS[region]; return `https://www.${config.amazonDomain}/dp/${asin}?tag=${config.affiliateTag}`; } ``` Correctly generates URLs for all 6 regions. ### RegionContext Located in `/src/contexts/RegionContext.tsx`: - [x] `useRegion()` hook provided - [x] Auto-detection via localStorage -> navigator.language -> timezone -> default - [x] `getLink()` method resolves product links - [x] `formatAmount()` and `formatRange()` for price formatting --- ## RECOMMENDATIONS ### Critical (Must Fix Before Release) 1. **Fix invalid relatedGuide reference:** - File: `/src/data/guides/debloating-protocol.ts` - Change: `relatedGuides: ['sodium-bloating', 'cortisol-management', 'body-fat']` - To: `relatedGuides: ['cortisol-management', 'body-fat', 'nutrition-basics']` (or create sodium-bloating guide) ### High Priority 2. **Update comment in products-registry.ts:** - Line 4 says "73 products" but actual count is 76 products ### Medium Priority 3. **Replace duplicate product images:** - 12 images are reused across multiple products - Consider adding unique images for: paulas_retinol, ordinary_niacinamide, vichy_ha (all share same image), etc. ### Low Priority 4. **Address ESLint warnings** (non-blocking): - Replace `` with `` in 3 components - Fix React Hook dependency arrays in 2 files --- ## FILES REVIEWED | File | Status | |------|--------| | `/src/data/guides/products-registry.ts` | PASS (76 products) | | `/src/types/guides.ts` | PASS | | `/src/data/guides/index.ts` | PASS | | `/src/lib/region.ts` | PASS | | `/src/contexts/RegionContext.tsx` | PASS | | `/src/data/guides/mindset.ts` | PASS | | `/src/data/guides/skincare.ts` | PASS | | `/src/data/guides/hair-loss.ts` | PASS | | `/src/data/guides/anti-aging-women.ts` | PASS | | `/src/data/guides/training.ts` | PASS | | `/src/data/guides/diet.ts` | PASS | | `/src/data/guides/debloating-protocol.ts` | FAIL (invalid relatedGuide) | --- ## SUMMARY | Category | Status | Issues | |----------|--------|--------| | Product Registry | PASS WITH ISSUES | Duplicate images (Medium) | | Guide Content | PASS WITH ISSUES | 1 invalid relatedGuide reference (High) | | Type Safety | PASS | None | | Helper Functions | PASS | None | | Region System | PASS | None | **Final Verdict: PASS WITH ISSUES** The system is production-ready after fixing the critical issue (invalid `sodium-bloating` reference). The duplicate images issue is cosmetic and can be addressed post-launch.

toolUseResult.originalFile:
/**
 * Debloating Protocol Guide
 * Humor Level: Medium (15%)
 */

import { Guide } from '@/types/guides';

export const debloatingProtocolGuide: Guide = {
  id: 'debloating-protocol',
  slug: 'debloating-protocol',
  title: 'The Debloating Protocol',
  subtitle: "Look tighter in 24-72 hours",
  description: "How to reduce water retention, bloating, and puffiness for a sharper, more defined appearance.",
  icon: 'Droplets',
  humorLevel: 'medium',
  estimatedReadTime: 5,
  order: 75,
  tags: ['debloating', 'water-retention', 'bloating', 'aesthetics', 'puffiness'],
  relatedGuides: ['sodium-bloating', 'cortisol-management', 'body-fat'],
  productIds: ['magnesium_glycinate'],
  forumCategory: 'lifestyle',
  heroMedia: {
    id: 'debloating-hero',
    type: 'image',
    url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1490645935967-10de6ba17061?w=1200&q=80',
    alt: 'Lean defined physique',
    placement: 'hero',
  },
  sections: [
    {
      id: 'intro',
      title: 'Why You Look Puffy',
      humorLevel: 'medium',
      content: `You're not as fat as you think—you're probably just holding water.

**Common Causes of Bloating/Puffiness:**
- High sodium intake
- Low water intake (paradoxically)
- High carb intake (glycogen holds water)
- Poor sleep
- High cortisol/stress
- Food sensitivities
- Alcohol
- Hormonal fluctuations

**The Reality:**
2-8 lbs of your "weight" is water. This can make you look dramatically different day-to-day without any actual fat change.

**The Goal:**
Reduce unnecessary water retention for a tighter, more defined appearance.`,
    },
    {
      id: 'quick-protocol',
      title: 'The 24-72 Hour Protocol',
      humorLevel: 'medium',
      content: `**For a quick debloat (before event, photoshoot, etc.):**

**Day 1-2:**
- Increase water intake to 1 gallon+
- Reduce sodium to <1500mg
- Cut carbs to <50g
- No alcohol
- No dairy (if sensitive)
- No artificial sweeteners

**Day 3 (Event Day):**
- Moderate water (normal intake)
- Very low sodium
- Low carbs until event
- Small carb meal 2-3 hours before (optional pump)

**What Happens:**
- High water + low sodium = body flushes water
- Low carbs = glycogen depletes, releasing water
- Reduced inflammation = less puffiness

**Warning:**
This is for short-term aesthetics. Don't do this constantly—it's not sustainable or healthy long-term.`,
    },
    {
      id: 'daily-protocol',
      title: 'Daily Anti-Bloat Protocol',
      humorLevel: 'medium',
      content: `**For ongoing reduction in water retention:**

**Hydration:**
- Drink 3-4L water daily (more = body holds less)
- Add electrolytes (paradoxically reduces retention)
- Front-load water earlier in day

**Sodium:**
- Keep consistent (not too low, not too high)
- Avoid huge spikes (processed foods, restaurant meals)
- 2000-3000mg is fine for active people

**Carbs:**
- Moderate, consistent intake
- Avoid huge swings (low all week, binge on weekend)
- Each gram of carb holds 3-4g water

**Sleep:**
- 7-9 hours
- Poor sleep = cortisol = water retention

**Stress:**
- Manage cortisol (see cortisol guide)
- High stress = puffy face`,
      products: ['magnesium_glycinate'],
    },
    {
      id: 'supplements',
      title: 'Debloating Supplements',
      humorLevel: 'medium',
      content: `**Actually Work:**

**Dandelion Root**
- Natural diuretic
- 500-1500mg daily
- Don't use long-term

**Potassium**
- Balances sodium
- Get from food (bananas, potatoes) or supplement
- 3500-4700mg daily total

**Magnesium**
- Reduces water retention
- 200-400mg glycinate before bed

**Vitamin B6**
- Mild diuretic effect
- 50-100mg daily
- Especially helpful for hormonal bloating

**What Doesn't Work:**
- "Detox teas" (just make you poop)
- Most fat burners
- Waist trainers (lol)

**Warning:**
Don't abuse diuretics. They can cause electrolyte imbalances and are not sustainable.`,
      products: ['magnesium_glycinate'],
    },
    {
      id: 'food-triggers',
      title: 'Identify Your Triggers',
      humorLevel: 'medium',
      content: `**Common Bloating Triggers:**

**Dairy**
- Lactose intolerance is common
- Try eliminating for 1 week

**Gluten**
- Some people are sensitive (not celiac)
- Try eliminating for 1 week

**Artificial Sweeteners**
- Sugar alcohols especially (sorbitol, maltitol)
- Can cause gas and bloating

**FODMAPs**
- Fermentable carbs
- Beans, onions, garlic, certain fruits
- May cause bloating in sensitive individuals

**Carbonated Drinks**
- Literally putting gas in your stomach
- Switch to flat water

**How to Identify:**
1. Eliminate suspected trigger for 7-14 days
2. Note if bloating improves
3. Reintroduce and see if it returns
4. Keep a food diary

**The 80% Rule:**
For most people, the main triggers are: too much sodium, too little water, inconsistent carb intake, poor sleep, and stress.`,
    },
    {
      id: 'action-plan',
      title: 'Your Debloating Protocol',
      humorLevel: 'medium',
      content: `**This Week (Baseline):**
- [ ] Increase water to 3-4L daily
- [ ] Track sodium (aim for consistency)
- [ ] Sleep 7-9 hours
- [ ] Note which meals cause bloating

**Ongoing:**
- [ ] Keep carb intake consistent (no huge swings)
- [ ] Limit alcohol
- [ ] Manage stress/cortisol
- [ ] Consider eliminating dairy/gluten trial

**Before Events:**
- [ ] 48-72 hour protocol (high water, low sodium, low carb)
- [ ] Reduce water day-of slightly
- [ ] Small carb meal before for pump (optional)

**Supplement Stack (Optional):**
- Magnesium: 200-400mg nightly
- Potassium: From food primarily
- Dandelion root: Short-term use only

**The Payoff:**
Consistent hydration + consistent sodium + good sleep + managed stress = you'll naturally hold less water and look tighter day-to-day.

Most of the variation in how you look is water, not fat. Control the water, control your appearance.`,
      products: ['magnesium_glycinate'],
    },
  ],
};

## Summary - Guides System Ready for Release

All critical issues have been resolved:

### Completed Fixes
1. **heroMedia** - Added to `core-neck.ts`
2. **FR/AU regions** - Added to all 22 remaining products (scar_gel, lrp_spf50, paulas_retinol, vichy_ha, and 18 others earlier)
3. **Invalid relatedGuides** - Fixed 7 references:
   - `cutting-guide.ts`: body-fat-basics → body-fat
   - `testosterone-nutrition.ts`: body-fat-basics → body-fat
   - `debloating-protocol.ts`: water-retention → cortisol-management, body-fat-basics → body-fat, sodium-bloating → nutrition-basics
   - `estrogen-balance.ts`: body-fat-basics → body-fat
   - `nutrition-basics.ts`: body-fat-basics → body-fat
   - `toxic-swaps.ts`: skincare-basics → skincare

### Final Validation Results
| Category | Status |
|----------|--------|
| Product Registry | **PASS** (76 products, 5 regions each) |
| Guide Content | **PASS** (62 guides with heroMedia) |
| Type Safety | **PASS** (no TypeScript errors) |
| Helper Functions | **PASS** |
| Region System | **PASS** |

### Remaining Non-Critical (Post-Launch)
- 12 duplicate product images (cosmetic only)
- ESLint warnings (img vs Image, hook dependencies)

**The guides system is now production-ready.**
